data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meyer, Harry A. (2011): Tardigrada of Grand Cayman, West Indies, with descriptions of two new species of eutardigrade, Doryphoribius tessellatus (Hypsibiidae) and Macrobiotus caymanensis (Macrobiotidae). Zootaxa 2812: 28-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.205995
